alert.note: Alert for Eastern Norton Sound and Nulato Hills (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued November 16 at 3:57AM AKST until November 16 at 3:00PM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 PM AKST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Heavy snow is moving northeast, light snow and mixed precipitation is continuing. Blowing snow. Additional snow accumulations of around 1 inch. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Eastern Norton Sound and Nulato Hills. * WHEN...Until 3 PM AKST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Areas of blowing snow could reduce visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...There is a chance for a wintry mix from Unalakleet south. Ice accumulations of a light glaze are possible.
info.instruction: A Winter Storm Warning for snow means severe winter weather conditions are expected or occurring. This will make travel very difficult or impossible.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Norton Sound and Nulato Hills
